D.Y. Patil College of Engineering and Technology Kolhapur. Is an autonomous engineering institute in Kolhapur, Established in 1984 by Dr. D.Y Patil and Dr. Sanjay D. Patil.

patterns: What is the vision of college?
responses: Vision of our institute is 'To become a leading institute in producing high quality technical professionals for Nation Building.'

patterns: What are the Features of College?
responses: Here are Few Features of college: WIFI enable campus, Excellent placement record, 10000+ worldwide alumni record, All Govt. Scholarships available to student, Bus facility available

Following are the reasons behind why you must choose DYPCET, Industry based curriculum under Autonomy, Highest placement record in the region, Soft skills training, 42 Gold Medals and 252 Ranks in Shivaji University Exam

Following Under graduate Programs are offered by college: 1)Chemical Engineering 2)Civil Engineering 3)Computer Science and Engineering 4)CSE(Data Science) 5)CSE(Artificial Inteligence and Machine Learning) 6)Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering 7)Mechanical Engineering
Exam Patten is as Follows:  ISE1-10M, MSE-30M, ISE2-10M, ESE-50M
Exams required for admission : MHT-CET/JEE Main- B.E./ B.Arch and HSC 12th with 50+ (PCM)
Following Main documents are required for admission: 1.Domicile Certificate 2.MH-CET Score Card 3.School Leaving Certificate 4.SSC & HSC Marksheet
Our campus offers a range of Student Clubs including 1)Coding Club 2)Creator Club 3)GDSC Club 4)Robotics Club 5)Cultural Club 6)Sports Club 7)R&D Club 8)MLSA Club
Our faculty members are highly qualified (PhD) and experienced in their respective fields. We also have dedicated staff members to support students.

patterns: please give me the information about the placements of your college
responses: 100% placement Rate. 700+ Job Offers for 2023 Batch. For More info visit :https://coek.dypgroup.edu.in/training-placement/tpo-message/
Fee Structure for Engineering: 1)OPEN:₹1,15,078 2)OBC/EBC/EWS/MARATHA:₹66,383  3)TFWS:₹17,687 4)SC/NT:₹3078 5)SBC/VJ/NT/DC:₹17,687 6)JK & GOI:₹27,078
For All Branches Syllabus Visit: https://coek.dypgroup.edu.in/academics/syllabus/
You can contact us via phone at 0231 260 1433 or email at  info.dypcet@dypgroup.edu.in.

patterns: what is the cutoff for admission?
responses: You can get 2023 Cutoff of all Branches at: https://fe2023.mahacet.org/CAP-I/CAPR-I_6250.pdf
DYPCET loves you !

responses: College address: D.Y.Patil College Of Engineering technology kasaba bawada,Kolhapur, Location : https://maps.app.goo.gl/9mUNUswUj23nvfdK8
Yes DYPCET is an autonomous institute accredited with A Grade by NAAC and accredited by NBA
